name: Sixth Sense
overview:
Sixth Sense. A smart electrical socket that helps save energy.

Mission 2013: Every Home, a Smart Home. Every Office, a Smart Office.

Smart technology that helps save energy and offers convenience of control over your household and workplace equipment from your smartphone.

Such technology exists. Usually referred to as “Smart Homes”. And more often than not, it is expensive, difficult to install and not simple to use.

We are about to change that. One socket at a time.

Our design goals are very clear: keep it simple, keep it affordable.

To know more, watch our preview video: http://vimeo.com/pendse/sixthsense

and visit our website www.getsixthsense.com

As we continue our efforts to develop our technology, we’d love to hear from you. Feedback, criticism, inspiration, ideas, suggestions - write on our Facebook wall or email us info@getsixthsense.com

Thank you!
